title: Dungeon DOM
desc: Co-Developing a lite dungeon crawler game in Vanilla JS using the Web Component API. Aside from a random seed generator library, all code is built in-house using Vanilla JavaScript.

title: Brad's Deals Shopping Guide
desc: Lead the redesign of the heavily trafficked shopping guide section of the Brad's Deals website. Designed from the ground up to be mobile first, as over 50% of our demographic used our site on their mobile devices.

title: Artedi Diving App
desc: Original developer for a scientific diving school based in Puerto Rico. Built an app students could use underwater to survey fish and export their survey data, saving hours of post-dive data entry work in the lab.
